page.title: 15SCHOOL IN EPPING ON MONDAY
page.content: Every school morning I awake to the sound of my alarm-clock ringing.At 7.30 a.m I get out of bed and go down and have breakfast with my two sisters.For breakfast I have corn- flakes and toast with jam or marmalade.(My nanny makes the jam.) At 7.45 a.m I wash and get dressed ready for school.I always wear the school colours which are green,grey, black and white.My skirt and my jumper are grey, my tie is green and white,my blouse is white and so are my socks.I am washed and dressed by 8.20 a.m. I pack my bag with my lunch box and project folder which is about an organisation in Epping.I leave by motor car for school at 8.40 a.m.When I get to school I play in the playground until the whistle goes. (cont.)
